member.name: T:ITI.Gymunity.FP.APIs.Controllers.ChatController
member.summary: Provides API endpoints for managing chat threads and messages for authenticated users.
member.remarks: All actions in this controller require the user to be authenticated. The controller enables users to retrieve their chat threads, view messages within a thread, send messages, and mark messages or entire threads as read. Most endpoints return results in a standard response format indicating success or failure. For real-time messaging, consider using SignalR in addition to these endpoints.
